source.Select: SELECT Deptid,Descr,Descr_ac Descr_a,Manager_Id,Tree_Level_Num,Z_DEPTID_PARENT Uporg_Code_a,Company, Z_PLANT_ID Plant_Id_a,Location,Z_SAL_LOCATION Sal_Location_a,0 Flag,'AddCoHead2Org' MUSER,to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') MDATE FROM PS_Z_OG2_WZSERS_VW
source.Update: UPDATE EMP_ORG_STANDARD SET DESCR=:DESCR,DESCR_A=:DESCR_A,MANAGER_ID=:MANAGER_ID,TREE_LEVEL_NUM=:TREE_LEVEL_NUM::INTEGER,UPORG_CODE_A=:UPORG_CODE_A, COMPANY=:COMPANY,PLANT_ID_A=:PLANT_ID_A,LOCATION=:LOCATION,SAL_LOCATION_A=:SAL_LOCATION_A,FLAG=:FLAG::INTEGER,MUSER=:MUSER,MDATE=to_date(:MDATE,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE DEPTID=:DEPTID
source.Check: SELECT DEPTID FROM EMP_ORG_STANDARD WHERE DEPTID=:DEPTID
